嶾字的基本解释

嶾
yǐn
〔嶾嶙（
l妌 ）〕（山）高峻，如“峰崖崇峻，巘崿嶾嶾。”

嶾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐn］
［《廣韻》於謹切，上隱，影。］
见“嶾嶙”。

嶾字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶾； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页321第33
【廣韻】於謹切【集韻】倚謹切，?音隱。嶾嶙，山峻貌。詳嶙字註。　【集韻】或从隱。亦作?。

嶾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嶾字的起名意思

暂无。

Concubine
Basic explanation of words
Concubine
yǐn
〔嶾嶙(
l 妌)] (Mountain) is high and steep, such as "The cliff is steep, and the cliff is steep."
Concubine
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐn］
["Guangyun" Yu Jinqie, Shangyin, Ying. ]
See "嶾嶙".
Concubine
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶾; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 321 33
[Guangyun] Yu Jinqie [Jiyun] Lean on Jinqie, and the sound is hidden. Shaggy, the mountains are majestic. Detailed note of the word.　【Ji Yun】or Cong Yin. Also for?.
